sourcesContent:
import {FaSignInAlt, FaSignOutAlt, FaUser} from 'react-icons/fa' import {NavLink, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { logout, reset } from '../features/users/usersSlice' import { StyledNavbar } from '../styles/Navbar.styled' import { StyledReactions } from '../styles/Reactions.styled' const Navbar = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.users) const nickname = user? user.nickname : null const onLogout = () => { dispatch(logout()) dispatch(reset()) navigate('/') } return ( MERN CRUD
    { user? ( <>
  • {nickname}
  • My Profile
  • Logout
    • ) : ( <>
  • Sign In
  • Sign Up
    • ) }
) } export default Navbar
